mapper.insert: insert into blog_table (blog_Id, blog_title, blog_release_time, blog_hits, blog_support, blog_comment_num, blog_cateId, blog_wordCount, blog_isOrigina, blog_cite_origina, blog_content) values (#{blogId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{blogTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{blogReleaseTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{blogHits,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{blogSupport,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{blogCommentNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{blogCateid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{blogWordcount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{blogIsorigina,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{blogCiteOrigina,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{blogContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update blog_table set blog_title = #{blogTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, blog_release_time = #{blogReleaseTime,jdbcType=DATE}, blog_hits = #{blogHits,jdbcType=INTEGER}, blog_support = #{blogSupport,jdbcType=INTEGER}, blog_comment_num = #{blogCommentNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, blog_cateId = #{blogCateid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, blog_wordCount = #{blogWordcount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, blog_isOrigina = #{blogIsorigina,jdbcType=INTEGER}, blog_cite_origina = #{blogCiteOrigina,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, blog_content = #{blogContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where blog_Id = #{blogId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select blog_Id, blog_title, blog_release_time, blog_hits, blog_support, blog_comment_num, blog_cateId, blog_wordCount, blog_isOrigina, blog_cite_origina, blog_content from blog_table where blog_Id = #{blogId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select blog_Id, blog_title, blog_release_time, blog_hits, blog_support, blog_comment_num, blog_cateId, blog_wordCount, blog_isOrigina, blog_cite_origina, blog_content from blog_table
